code: import React from"react";import{Nav,Navbar,Stack}from"react-bootstrap";import nuub from"../../assets/img/cropped-nuub_logo.png";import axios from"axios";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var LoggedInNavigation=function LoggedInNavigation(){var navigate=useNavigate();var _useTranslation=useTranslation(),t=_useTranslation.t;var handleLogOut=function handleLogOut(){axios.post("http://localhost/api/logout.php").then(function(response){if(response.data){navigate("/login");}}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Navbar,{className:"loggedInNavigation pt-3",expand:"lg",style:{backgroundColor:"#EBBFF3",borderBottom:"4px solid black"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar.Brand,{href:"/dashboard",className:"nuub ms-2 p-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:nuub,width:"246px",height:"83px",alt:"logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar.Toggle,{"aria-controls":"navbar-nav"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar.Collapse,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Stack,{direction:"horizontal",gap:3,className:"ms-auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Nav,{className:"nav justify-content-end me-auto",style:{fontSize:30,fontWeight:"bold",fontFamily:"primary-font"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{href:"/profile",className:"me-4",children:t("My profile")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{href:"/appointmentlist",className:"me-4",children:t("My appointments")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{className:"me-5",style:{color:"#EB3131"},onClick:handleLogOut,children:t("Sign Out")})]})})})]});};export default LoggedInNavigation;
